title: UploadResult
description: Describes the result of a source upload processing.

upload_id.description: Unique long-lived identifier for the upload processing result.

status.description: Final status of the upload processing job.

completion_time.description: The date-time when the job finished.

start_time.description: The date-time when the job started.

log.description: Includes errors or other information that may be relevant for debugging upload issues.
